sentences.en: A dull red flush suffused Selby's face.
sentences.cn: 塞尔比的脸庞泛起了淡淡的红晕。

sentences.en: But all the bloomy flush of life is fled.
sentences.cn: 而整个精力旺盛的青春已经一去不复返了.

sentences.en: Do you sweat a lot or flush a lot?
sentences.cn: 你常出汗或是脸上常发烫吗？

sentences.en: Flush the eye with clean cold water for at least 15 minutes.
sentences.cn: 用干净冷水冲洗眼睛至少15分钟。

sentences.en: He flushed angrily .
sentences.cn: 他气得满脸通红。

sentences.en: He is in the full flush of success ; nothing was an obstacle .
sentences.cn: 他的成就如日中天, 锐不可当.

sentences.en: He was found trying to flush banknotes down the toilet.
sentences.cn: 他试图把钞票从马桶里冲走时被发现。

sentences.en: He's no longer in his first flush.
sentences.cn: 他不再洋溢着青春的活力.

sentences.en: His words brought a warm flush to her face.
sentences.cn: 他那番话讲得她脸红发烫。

sentences.en: If we're feeling flush we'll probably give them champagne.
sentences.cn: 等我们有钱了就可能会给他们喝香槟。

sentences.en: Make sure the tile is flush with the surrounding tiles.
sentences.cn: 要保证每块瓷砖都和它周围的瓷砖在同一平面上。

sentences.en: Please flush these test tubes.
sentences.cn: 请把这些试管冲洗一下.

sentences.en: She felt a sudden flush of anger.
sentences.cn: 她突然感到一阵愤怒。

sentences.en: She flushed the rest of her drink down the toilet .
sentences.cn: 她把剩下的酒倒进抽水马桶里冲走了。

sentences.en: She made Tina flush the pills down the toilet.
sentences.cn: 她让蒂娜把药丸扔进马桶里冲走。

sentences.en: Susan flushed deeply and looked away.
sentences.cn: 苏珊脸涨得通红，目光转向别处。

sentences.en: There was a flush in her cheeks.
sentences.cn: 她满脸通红.

sentences.en: There was a slight flush on his cheeks.
sentences.cn: 他脸上泛起一丝红晕。

sentences.en: This medicine will help to flush out your body.
sentences.cn: 这药有利于冲洗你的肠胃.

sentences.en: We used a dog to flush out the rabbits.
sentences.cn: 我们用条狗把那些兔子赶走.

sentences.en: Why do children never remember to flush the loo?
sentences.cn: 小孩子为什么从来都不记得冲马桶？

words.tran_cn: 大量的；齐平的；丰足的，洋溢的；挥霍的
激动，洋溢；面红；萌芽；旺盛；奔流
使齐平；发红，使发亮；用水冲洗；使激动

trans.tran_cn: 满面红光的，富足的，丰富的，盈满的，没过的，水平的，同高的
trans.tran_en: if two surfaces are flush, they are at exactly the same level, so that the place where they meet is flat

trans.tran_cn: 奔流，涌出，脸红或发亮，发热，强烈情感的冲动
trans.tran_en: a red colour that appears on your face when you are angry or embarrassed
to become red in the face, for example when you are angry or embarrassed
to become red in the face, for example when you are angry or embarrassed
if you flush a toilet, or if it flushes, you make water go through it to clean it

trans.tran_cn: 发红或发亮，使兴奋或得意，（以水）冲刷，冲洗，冲掉，除掉
